name: GameJamHERO
description:
Made in 2 weeks for the Matt Aspland Summer Jam.

A recreation of the 1984 classic H.E.R.O.  by John Van Ryzin. A blast from the past!

Only the first 10 levels were completed in time for the Jam. Will create the final 10 at a later date.

Make your way into the mines to rescue trapped miners before you run out of helipack power.

Use your TnT to blast through walls that are blocking your path.

Avoid cave critters or blast them with your laser to prevent losing a life.

Watch out for deadly lava walls and underground pools. Ouch! Hot!

Oh, and don't hit the laterns or be faced with blackness. (Use TnT to temporarily light the way)

Good luck!
